compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/faiqahmad/ImageResizerApp/AppResiz.serviceRawFile:
service: image-resizer

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: ap-southeast-2
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - s3:GetObject
        - s3:PutObject
      Resource: arn:aws:s3:::image-resizer-uploads/*

functions:
  getPresignedUrl:
    handler: getPresignedUrl/index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: presigned-url
          method: get
          cors: true

  imageProcessor:
    handler: imageProcessor/index.handler
    events:
      - s3:
          bucket: image-resizer-uploads
          event: s3:ObjectCreated:*
          rules:
            - prefix: uploads/original/
